name: TREBUCHET
description: TREBUCHET! The Industry Award Winning New Classic! Starting with a set of balls and pieces, move your blocks around to free your balls and tilt the board to align to and knock out opposing pieces! Eliminate the enemies King piece - or reach the opposing corner with your King first to Win the game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 300 MHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 11 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Trebuchet Discovered! Excellent, addictive, original new game. Well worth the price...
